title: Drawn
description: A Paranormal Romance NovellaA recurring dream drives Tess Wright to journey across the country until she finds a strange sense of peace in a small town in Montana. A place where the dark woods are calling to her – and a place she has seen in her dreams without ever having been there before.In a beautiful and out-of-the-way B&B she wants to get to the bottom of the matter and quickly connects with the owner’s son Nathan Hawkins. But as Tess begins to fall in love, the lines between dream and reality blur.For how could Nathan be possibly the man in her dream?18+, contains graphic sex scenes
author: Lilou Roux
